name: Windows MSVC 2022
environmentSetupScript: Import-Module "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll";Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath "C://Program Files//Microsoft Visual Studio//2022//Community" -DevCmdArguments "-arch=x64 -host_arch=x64" -SkipAutomaticLocation
